desc: Pangaia's clothing is eco-friendly merging Fashion, Science, and Nature to produce a new wave of clothing. With a style for everyday use, with less washing, and colors that are made to mix and match.

layout.text:
A NEW SUMMER COLLECTION IS ON THE HORIZON!
SUNIRSE BLUE, SUNSET PINK, DAWN BLUE, AND DUSK GREEN
Limited summer collection, we sell as sets with either matching track pants, long shorts, or shorts
